name: Fruits Pair Festival March
description:
All T&M's fruits pairs have gathered in March too!!
Red string pair snow festival with the last snow falling!!

Controll two tied with a red string and win.
One shoots, the other defend.

Move around to 360°.
When your partner gets angry, embrace her/him.

It features Solo, Watch, Local BlueTooth VS, World WiFi VS.
Get along with your enemy exchanging messages.

What will happen to Yuki-chan and Suno-kun, when the warm spring comes.
The final episode of Fruits Pair Festival trilogy.
